pages.text: An engineer's primary tool, secondary for architects. $(br2)Allows instant collection of most of Create's blocks with Shift + Right Click and transports them to your inventory. It also adjusts many of Create's blocks by scrolling and right clicking to rotate and shortens Mechanical Belts.

pages.title: Wrench Recipe
pages.text: Use the Wrench on the ENDS of placed Mechanical Belts in order to shorten them so you don't break the whole belt!
